document_data.caption: A map showing Pandira in the Korinn Archipelago.
document_data.name: Pandira
document_data.mainbody: '''Pandira''' was an island within the [[Korinn Archipelago]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Pandira was one of the Korinn Archipelago's smaller named islands. It was found in the northern region of the archipelago surrounded by many smaller islands. Pandira was rather unremarkable save for the settlement of [[Westhaven]].
